feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: NW 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then southeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
